response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and quality. This product is not just an item; it's a solution designed to enhance your daily experience. Given its unique features and benefits, we believe its true worth exceeds $150. Considering this, I'm extending an exclusive offer to you at a special price of $180. This is an opportunity to acquire a high-quality product at a competitive rate. I trust that you'll find immense value in it. Let me know if you have any questions or need more information about the product.", "product_price": 180}
